name: Arthur: The Quest for Excalibur
description:
Arthur: The Quest for Excalibur is an adventure game developed by Infocom. It was originally released in 1989. Infocom published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Arthur: The Quest for Excalibur is available on PC, Commodore / Amiga, Apple II and Classic Macintosh.
Bob Bates and Christopher Erhardt produced the game.
